title: The Impact of Modern Technologies on Human Rights in the Digital Era
description: Introduction The rapid rise of modern technologies has fundamentally reshaped how societies function, communicate, and govern. Artificial intelligence (AI), digital surveillance systems, online censorship mechanisms, and vast data-collection infrastructures now influence nearly every aspect of daily life. While these innovations bring efficiency, connectivity, and economic opportunity, they also introduce complex challenges for the protection of […]

title: Artificial Generative Intelligence may be on horizon in 5-10 years: DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis
description: What researchers have built, he acknowledged, uses some of the same principles as biological intelligence.| India News
content: “We’re at a threshold moment where AGI — artificial general intelligence — is on the horizon,” Hassabis said at the keynote address on research at the India AI Impact Summit. He defined AGI as a system that can “exhibit all the cognitive capabilities... [6375 chars]

title: Global Market Today | Asian stocks rise after tech boosts US equities
description: Asian stocks climbed for a second day, mirroring a rebound in US tech shares and strong economic data. Oil prices held onto recent gains, marking their largest increase since October. Investors are reassessing the impact of artificial intelligence on tech companies, with some believing the recent selloff was an overreaction.
